Description

Provides classes for binding observable objects, for example UI widgets and model objects.

    IConverter<Integer,T>
    EnumConverters.fromOrdinal(Class<T> enumToType)
    Creates a converter which converts from Enum.ordinals to enum values of the given type.
    static <T extends Enum<T>>
    IConverter<String,T>
    EnumConverters.fromString(Class<T> enumToType)
    Creates a converter which converts from the EnumConverters.toString(java.lang.Class<T>) values of enums values to enum values themselves.
    static <T extends Enum<T>>
    IConverter<T,Integer>
    EnumConverters.toOrdinal(Class<T> enumFromType)
    Creates a converter which converts from Enum.ordinals to enum values of the given type.
    static <T extends Enum<T>>
    IConverter<T,String>
    EnumConverters.toString(Class<T> enumFromType)
    Creates a converter which converts to the EnumConverters.toString(java.lang.Class<T>) values of the enum constants.
